====Usage notes====
In Japan, there are considered to be five simple machines, which are the same as the devices considered to be simple machines in the West, with the exception of this device, the [[inclined plane]], which is not usually considered a simple machine in Japan. The five devices usually considered to be simple machines in Japan are the [[screw]], [[wedge]], [[pulley]], [[lever]], and [[wheel and axle]].
